product_name: REI Traverse Junior Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Sized for young outdoor adventurers, the REI Traverse Junior trekking poles adjust easily to give your growing explorer added stability and traction on the trail. Twist-lock mechanisms lock the 2-section, telescoping poles at the desired length and adjust easily for varied terrain and different users. Corrosion-resistant and strong, the lightweight aluminum shafts provide reliable support, mile after mile. Durable plastic handles have an easy-to-hold ergonomic shape and small grip to fit small hands; adjustable straps support the wrists. Strong stainless-steel tips with trekking discs won't sink into the mud or snow.
short_description: Sized for young outdoor adventurers, the REI Traverse Junior trekking poles adjust easily to give your growing explorer added stability and traction on the trail.
